description: This file defines the DesiVocalTools class, which provides methods to interact with the DesiVocal API for voice retrieval and text-to-speech conversion. It extends a Toolkit class and uses external requests to communicate with the API, as well as external classes for audio artifacts and agents.

classes.name: DesiVocalTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with DesiVocal API, providing voice retrieval and text-to-speech functionalities.

methods.name: get_voices
methods.description: Fetches and returns a list of available voices from the DesiVocal API.

methods.name: text_to_speech
methods.description: Generates speech audio from text prompt using a specified or default voice, and adds the resulting audio artifact to the agent.
